questions.question: In Ukraine, it's common to decorate Christmas trees with spider web. Why?

choices.answer: Because spiders are considered holy in Ukraine
To remember the dead, as a prolonged Halloween celebration
A legend about spiders who helped a widow decorate her tree
To remember the animals who kept baby Jesus warm at birth

questions.question: Why do kids in Iceland put a shoe in their windowsill on December 12-23?

choices.answer: In case Santa needs new shoes on his way from the North Pole
To show Santa that they have behaved well
To receive gifts or a potato from the 13 Yule Lads
To keep evil spirits out of their bedrooms

questions.question: Mince pies are traditionally served at Christmas in the UK. Where did they originate from?

choices.answer: Queen Victoria discovered them when she was Empress of India
Middle Eastern recipes that European Crusaders brought over
From the ancient Roman festival of Saturnalia
They were given to British soldiers during World War I
